item.description:
Embrace your juiciest self…discover how succulent life really can be!

Imprint a new way of being! Commit to gifting your body (the divine temple you occupy) just ONE day of fresh, organic juices for nine weeks in a row & the tenth day is on us! Pick up is Thursday or Friday afternoons @ Alchemy – includes 64oz of pure, organic juice plus a 2oz wheatgrass grown on site or E3 Live Blue Green Algae shot made to perfection just for Y-O-U!

Investment: $50 per day starts on the Equinox.

Email Imani@mamaliciousmarket.com to reserve your spot.

Complimentary infrared sauna sessions to start your journey & to celebrate your achievement. We are here to support your success in achieving the optimal health you deserve 150%.

 

Not quite sure? Start Simple with a weekly veggie juice or superfood green smoothie during our open hours. Ask for our VIP kick start challenge and get your 10th drink to your health on us!
item.name: Juicy Challenge!
